Newark.Llewellyn Park:
Llewellyn Park is an unincorporated community and neighborhood within West Orange in Essex County, New Jersey, United States. It is a 425-acre (1.7 km2) gated residential community of 175 homes, 12 miles (19 km) west of New York City.

The Ramble is a common area of 50 acres (200,000 m2) landscaped with streams and paths.
